columns.name: ${AGGREGATION_UNIT}_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The id related to modw.${AGGREGATION_UNIT}s.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The resource the specification is for.

columns.name: cpu_cores_available
columns.comment: FACT: Number of cpu cores available for a time period

columns.name: gpu_cores_available
columns.comment: FACT: Number of gpu cores available for a time period

columns.name: cpu_nodes_available
columns.comment: FACT: Number of cpu nodes available for a time period

columns.name: gpu_nodes_available
columns.comment: FACT: Number of gpu nodes available for a time period

columns.name: core_time_available
columns.comment: FACT: Number of cpu cores available for a time period, in seconds

columns.name: gpu_time_available
columns.comment: FACT: Number of gpu cores available for a time period, in seconds

columns.name: su_available
columns.comment: FACT: Total number of SU's available for a time period

columns.name: resource_allocation_type_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Allocation type for the resource

columns.name: organization_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Organization the resource belongs to

columns.name: resource_state_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Geographical state of the organization to which the resource belongs

columns.name: resource_country_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: Country of the organization to which the resource belongs

columns.name: organizationtype_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The type of organization the resource belongs to

columns.name: resourcetype_id
columns.comment: DIMENSION: The type of resource the resource is
